GSD.description:
ax25: improve the incomplete fix to avoid UAF and NPD bugs

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.25 by commit 4c958f0c5714812461da7785393315b35145ac8c. For more details please see the references link.
